root: ^You approach Kellis' central HQ, the place is massive
^Several warships stand as a blockade which you have no hope of piercing
^A massive golden flower-like ship blinks into existence and begins ravaging the blockade
^You have your chance and fly foward

g-1: ^The lasers twist around your shield and cut through the attacking ships
g-3: ^You fight through the ships, --Weapons and % chance of --Hull
g-4: ^You divert power to engines and shields and ram through the ships and into the side of the HQ, --Hull and --Power

Hall_to_Hall: ^You get inside HQ's flight paths and internal weapons start to light up.
^Lanri or Mateo figures out where the obelisk from Campaign 2 is being kept

g-2: ^Requires Disintegration Ray variable, burn through the walls to reach your objective--Power, -Weapons
g-3: ^Send security as a forward team to disable the guns and ensure safe passage, --Security, % chance of --Hull
g-4: ^You blast apart the guns and trade hits, --Weapons % chance of --Hull

Final_Boss: ^You locate the artifact vault and the CEO and IT guys trying to reign in the AI outside using it

g-1: ^Requires Exo Suit variable, send your Security Team to deal with the CEO and recover the artifact
g-3: ^Break into the vault and obliterate the defenses with your ship, ----Hull, --Weapons
g-4: ^You use the ship as a projectile to break through the vault

Final_Choice: ^With the power of the artifact recovered you must decide how to end thing
Final_Choice_Shipless: ^With the power of the artifact recovered you must decide how to end thing
